Text: thanks goosey, appreciate all that you do!! mininova = not gooder :(

Thank you so much for your hard work!  I will take whatever your willing to give as far as time and quality.  I am almost a month behind as it is!  :)

I sign up via RSS and the feeds keep dying.  Awhile ago piratebay feed died so I signed up for you on Mininova and now that is down...  I am off to find an RSS!
So... M i n i n o v a is dead, Demonoid is down, who would have thunk TPB would be the last one standing? There is still isohunt, but they are weird.
RIP  mini nova. Im glad you make the rounds, goose. I need my O&A
